Module frogger
Package frogger.model

Class Record

java.lang.Object
frogger.model.Record
public class Record
extends java.lang.Object
The object for facilitating operations on the leaderboard file.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Record

      public Record() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialises with a read from the leaderboard file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an error occurred.

  • Method Details

    • size

      public int size()
      Gets the size of the records.
      Returns:
      the size of the records as an integer.

    • add

      public void add​(int score, java.lang.String date, java.lang.String name)
      Adds a record.
      Parameters:
      score - the score as an integer.
      date - the date in a specific format as a String.
      name - the name of the player as a String.

    • sort

      public void sort()
      Sorts the records according to the score in descending order.

    • getScore

      public int getScore​(int id)
      Gets the score of a specified record.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the record as an integer. Must be within the range.
      Returns:
      the score of the specified record as an integer.

    • getDate

      public java.lang.String getDate​(int id)
      Gets the date of a specified record.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the record as an integer. Must be within the range.
      Returns:
      the date of the specified record as a String.

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName​(int id)
      Gets the name of a specified record.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the record as an integer. Must be within the range.
      Returns:
      the name of the specified record as a String.

    • write

      public void write() throws java.io.IOException
      Writes the record to the leaderboard file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be written to.

    • read

      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> read() throws java.io.IOException
      Reads from the leaderboard file. Creates the file if it does not exist.
      Returns:
      all lines in the leaderboard file as a List.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the directory or file cannot be created.
